Act1Scene1.speaker: First Witch
Act1Scene1.text: When shall we three meet again — In thunder, lightning, or in rain?

Act1Scene1.speaker: Second Witch
Act1Scene1.text: When the hurlyburly’s done, when the battle’s lost and won.

Act1Scene1.speaker: Third Witch
Act1Scene1.text: That will be ere the set of sun.

Act1Scene1.speaker: All
Act1Scene1.text: Fair is foul, and foul is fair. Hover through the fog and filthy air.
